scripts.compile: mkdir -p build/circuits && npx circom circuits/main.circom -o build/circuits/main.json && npx snarkjs info -c build/circuits/main.json
scripts.setup: npx snarkjs setup --protocol groth -c build/circuits/main.json --pk build/circuits/main_proving_key.json --vk build/circuits/main_verification_key.json
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run bin && npm run contract
